amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Homeland Security's strategic plan to include a plan for fulfilling existing National Laboratory infrastructure commitments to maintain current capabilities and mission needs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 110-136 to require the Department of Homeland Security's strategic plan to include a plan for fulfilling existing National Laboratory infrastructure commitments to maintain current capabilities and mission needs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
